verses.name: Colossians 1:9
verses.text: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;

verses.name: Colossians 1:10
verses.text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;

verses.name: Colossians 1:11
verses.text: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;

verses.name: Colossians 1:12
verses.text: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
